tr_quotes.quote: İki kulağımız ve bir ağzımız var; demek ki konuştuğumuzdan iki kat daha fazla dinlemeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktetos

tr_quotes.quote: İletişim sanatı liderlik dilidir.
tr_quotes.author: James Humes

tr_quotes.quote: Sarılmak, kelimelerin eksik olduğunu ifade etmek içindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anne Frank

tr_quotes.quote: Kişi, bağlamada iyi ise, halatın düğümlerine ihtiyaç yoktur, yalnızca kalbin arkadaşlığı yeter.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: İletişimdeki en önemli unsur söylenmeyenleri duymaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

tr_quotes.quote: Bazılarıyla kaliteli iletişim kurabilmenin tek yolu, onlarla araya mesafe koymaktan geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Akilah Azra Kohen

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük iletişim problemimiz: Anlamak için dinlemiyoruz. Cevap vermek için dinliyoruz.
tr_quotes.author: Metin Hara

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar karşılıklı olarak birbirlerinden ne beklediklerini düpedüz söyleseler, herhalde hayatta karlı ve daha memnun olurlardı.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Yalanla ‘iletişim’ kurmak ve yalanı ‘yutturmak’ bir başarı değildir. Sadece yenilginin ertelenmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları geçimsiz yapan sevgisizliktir. Birbirine düşman eden iletişimsizliktir. Güzellikten yana ne varsa yok eden ilgisizliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: İletişim güçtür, iletişimi etkili kullanabilenler, kendilerinin dünya deneyimlerini ve dünyanın onlar üzerindeki deneyimlerini değiştirebilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: Küçükken hayvanlarla konuşsam ne ilginç olur diye düşünürdüm, meğer yıllardır iletişim kurabildiğim bir sürü hayvan varmış.
tr_quotes.author: Özdemir Asaf

tr_quotes.quote: İletişimi etkin kullanabilenler, kendilerinin dünya deneyimleri ve dünyanın onlar üzerindeki deneyimlerini değiştirebilir.
tr_quotes.author: George Shinn

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar gerçekten iletişim kurabilse, akıl hastanelerine gerek olmazdı.
tr_quotes.author: Tim Parks

tr_quotes.quote: Sürekli konuşmak iletişim kurmak demek değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çünkü kelimeler ancak benzer deneyimleri paylaşan insanlar arasında iletişim sağlayabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Alan Watts

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık tesadüftür, asıl sorun insanların iletişim kuramamaları.
tr_quotes.author: Bird box

tr_quotes.quote: İletişimi kesmek, bazen en güzel iletişim metodudur.
tr_quotes.author: Eliot

tr_quotes.quote: İletişim ancak insanların birbirini anlama ihtiyaçları sayesinde kurulabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek iletişim, bir canın başka bir cana ulaşmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Doğan Cüceloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Çocuklar duyarak, doğrusu hissederek iletişim kurarlar. Çocuk bir ruh okuyucusudur. Karşısındakinin ne dediğini değil, ne söylemek istediğini anlarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Adem Güneş

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları geçimsiz yapan sevgisizliktir. Birbirine düşman eden iletişimsizliktir. Güzellikten yana ne varsa yok eden ilgisizliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: İletişimdeki en mühim faktör söylenmeyenleri duymaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük iletişim problemimiz: Anlamak için dinlemiyoruz. Cevap vermek için dinliyoruz.
tr_quotes.author: Metin Hara

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyadaki en temel iletişim sorunlarından biri; zarif davrandığınızda zayıf sanılmanız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çocuğunuza güvenin; onda sınırlar ve sorumluluk bilinci geliştirmenin tek yolu, ona güvenmekten geçer. Ona güvenin ve onunla sürekli iletişim içinde olun.
tr_quotes.author: Doğan Cüceloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Cümleler hafifçe kalıyor yaşanılanların ağırlığı karşısında. Bu nedenle susmak bu aralar en oldukça kullandığım iletişim şeklim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Faal iletişimde bulunabilmek için hepinizin dünyayı değişik halde algıladığımızın ve bu algılamalarımızı diğerleriyle iletişimimizde kılavuz olarak kullandığımızın farkına varmalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: İletişimi faal kullanabilenler, kendilerinin dünya deneyimleri ve dünyanın onlar üstündeki deneyimlerini değiştirebilir.
tr_quotes.author: George Shinn

tr_quotes.quote: Çocuklar duyarak, yani hissederek iletişim kurarlar. Çocuk bir ruh okuyucusudur. Karşısındakinin ne söylediğini değil, ne söylemek istediğini anlarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Adem Güneş

tr_quotes.quote: Küçükken hayvanlarla konuşsam ne ilginç olur diye düşünürdüm, meğer yıllardır iletişim kurabildiğim bir sürü hayvan varmış.
tr_quotes.author: Özdemir Asaf

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızdım, kendi dünyama hapsolmuştum, diğerleriyle iletişim kuramıyordum; varlığımı onların varlığından ayıran, beni onların hayatı ve faaliyetleri dışında tutan camdan bir duvar vardı sanki.
tr_quotes.author: Christy Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Etkin iletişimde bulunabilmek için hepinizin dünyayı farklı şekilde algıladığımızın ve bu algılamalarımızı diğerleriyle iletişimimizde rehber olarak kullandığımızın farkına varmalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: İletişim güçtür, iletişimi etkili kullanabilenler, kendilerinin dünya deneyimlerini ve dünyanın onlar üzerindeki deneyimlerini değiştirebilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: İletişim deniz gibidir. Kişilere göre farklı formüller uygulamak zorundasınız. Bir gün iki metrelik suya dalarsınız, bir gün on beş metreye dek tek nefesle inersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Ahmet Şerif İzgören

tr_quotes.quote: Ürün ve hizmet kalitesinden bahsediyoruz, peki ya ilişkilerimizin kalitesinden, iletişim kalitesinden, birbirimize karşı verdiğimiz sözlerin kalitesinden ne haber.
tr_quotes.author: Max de Pree

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar karşılıklı olarak birbirlerinden ne beklediklerini düpedüz söyleseler, herhalde hayatta karlı ve daha memnun olurlardı.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın ruhunun sırlarını çözmeye çalışan psikoloji ilminin, en sevdiğim kavramı ”empati”dir. İletişim hangi boyutta olursa olsun, empati ile yaklaştığımız zaman anlayışlı olmaya başlarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Sait Çamlıca

tr_quotes.quote: İletişimi etkin kullanabilenler, kendilerinin dünya deneyimleri ve dünyanın onlar üzerindeki deneyimlerini değiştirebilir.
tr_quotes.author: George Shinn

tr_quotes.quote: Etkili iletişim iki yönlü bir süreçtir, bir verici ile bir alıcı arasındaki düşünce alışverişidir. Her bir tarafın bu sürece katılımı geçmiş deneyler, değerler, ihtiyaçlar ve duygulardan çıkan kişisel algılamalara dayanır.
tr_quotes.author: Bingaman

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar genellikle birbirlerinden nefret ederler çünkü birbirlerinden korkarlar; birbirlerinden korkarlar çünkü birbirlerini tanımazlar; birbirlerini tanımazlar çünkü iletişim kurmazlar; iletişim kurmazlar çünkü sınıflara ayrılmışlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther King

tr_quotes.quote: Düşündüğünüz, söylemek istediğiniz, söylediğinizi sandığınız, söylediğiniz, karşınızdakinin duymak istediği, duyduğu, anlamak istediği, anladığını sandığı, dolayısıyla insanlarının birbirini anlaması için birçok ihtimal var.
tr_quotes.author: Sylviane Herpin

tr_quotes.quote: Neden mi böyle? Sözlerin doğasından. Sözler, yalnızca birtakım gürültülerdir; duyguların, düşüncelerin, deneyimlerin yerini alan gürültüler. Semboller, işaretler. Gerçekler değil.
tr_quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini tanımayan, kendini unutan insanın kendi kendisiyle iletişimi kopar, kendine yabancılaşır; bu durum çevresine de yansır ve çevresiyle olan insani iletişim kopar. Bunun sonucu kalabalıklar içinde yalnızlaşan insandır.
tr_quotes.author: Ali Rıza Bayzan

tr_quotes.quote: Etkin iletişimde bulunabilmek için hepinizin dünyayı farklı şekilde algıladığımızın ve bu algılamalarımızı diğerleriyle iletişimimizde rehber olarak kullandığımızın farkına varmalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: Empati güven inşa eder. İletişimi güçlendirir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Konuşmak, hele yazmak yalnızca karşımızdakiyle iletişim değildir; sözcüklerin bilincimize ve bilinçaltımıza sürekli gönderdiği uyarılarla akan ve kendimizle, iç dünyamızla kurduğumuz bir iletişimdir aynı zamanda.
tr_quotes.author: Erendiz Atasü

tr_quotes.quote: İletişim güçtür, onu etkili kullanabilenler, kendilerinin dünya deneyimlerini ve dünyanın onlar üzerindeki deneyimlerini değiştirebilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: İletişimi etkin kullanabilenler, kendilerinin dünya deneyimleri ve dünyanın onlar üzerindeki deneyimlerini değiştirebilir.
tr_quotes.author: George Shinn

tr_quotes.quote: Cümleler hafif kalıyor yaşanılanların ağırlığı karşısında. Bu yüzden susmak bu aralar en çok kullandığım iletişim şeklim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Söz dudaktan çıktı mı, yarış atı bile tutamaz onu.
tr_quotes.author: Çin deyişi

tr_quotes.quote: Çok dinleyip, az konuşmak için iki kulağımız ve bir dilimiz vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Diyojen

tr_quotes.quote: Düşündüğünüz, söylemek istediğiniz, söylediğinizi sandığınız, söylediğiniz, karşınızdakinin duymak istediği, duyduğu, anlamak istediği, anladığını sandığı, dolayısıyla insanlarının birbirini anlaması için birçok ihtimal var.
tr_quotes.author: Sylviane Herpin

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow men. True nobility lies in being superior to your former self
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: I think women are foolish to pretend they are equal to men; they are far superior and always have been
en_quotes.author: William Golding

en_quotes.quote: They talk like angels but they live like men
en_quotes.author: St. Jerome

en_quotes.quote: Throughout the centuries there were men who took first steps, down new roads, armed with nothing but their own vision
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: I dress for the image. Not for myself, not for the public, not for fashion, not for men
en_quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

en_quotes.quote: Watches are the only jewelry men can wear, unless you're Mr. T
en_quotes.author: Gordon Bethune

en_quotes.quote: Real men laugh at opposition; real men smile when enemies appear
en_quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

en_quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of men; the dead and the deadly
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Monkeys are superior to men in this: when a monkey looks into a mirror, he sees a monkey
en_quotes.author: Malcolm de Chazal

en_quotes.quote: Wise men, when in doubt whether to speak or to keep quiet, give themselves the benefit of the doubt, and remain silent
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved
en_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

en_quotes.quote: All men can and will change. But there's only one woman we're going to change for
en_quotes.author: Steve Harvey

en_quotes.quote: Some men see things as they are, and ask why. I dream of things that never were, and ask why not
en_quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Temple was a man of the world amongst men of letters, a man of letters amongst men of the world
en_quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

en_quotes.quote: Men are born ignorant, not stupid. They are made stupid by education
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: The army teaches boys to think like men
en_quotes.author: Elvis Presley

en_quotes.quote: Yes, guns are to men what jewelry is to women!
en_quotes.author: Steve King

en_quotes.quote: The mass of men lead lives of quiet desperation. What is called resignation is confirmed desperation
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Elegance is always in style for men. There are all different kinds of elegance. It can be silk, it can be a T-shirt
en_quotes.author: Donatella Versace

en_quotes.quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: Perfect numbers like perfect men are very rare
en_quotes.author: Rene Descartes

en_quotes.quote: The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck
en_quotes.author: Channing Pollock

en_quotes.quote: Whatever women do, they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

en_quotes.quote: Anytime you get men in glitter, it's a flamboyant occasion!
en_quotes.author: Johnny Weir

en_quotes.quote: A lawyer with his briefcase can steal more than a hundred men with guns
en_quotes.author: Mario Puzo

en_quotes.quote: We sleep safe in our beds because rough men stand ready in the night to visit violence on those who would do us harm
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: More men die of jealousy than of cancer
en_quotes.author: Joseph P. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: I'm bisexual. And so, you know, I've dated men and women
en_quotes.author: Rachel Dolezal

en_quotes.quote: As long as you know men are like children, you know everything!
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: It takes a hero to be one of those men who goes into battle
en_quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

en_quotes.quote: I like being a woman, even in a man's world. After all, men can't wear dresses, but we can wear the pants
en_quotes.author: Whitney Houston

en_quotes.quote: An American monkey, after getting drunk on brandy, would never touch it again, and thus is much wiser than most men
en_quotes.author: Charles Darwin

en_quotes.quote: Wise men don't need advice. Fools won't take it
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: It has always been a mystery to me how men can feel themselves honoured by the humiliation of their fellow beings
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Most women don't like good men. They say they want a good buy, but most women always wind up with the bad boy
en_quotes.author: Stephanie Mills

en_quotes.quote: Brave men are all vertebrates; they have their softness on the surface and their toughness in the middle
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: Liberate the minds of men and ultimately you will liberate the bodies of men
en_quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

en_quotes.quote: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men
en_quotes.author: Herman Melville

en_quotes.quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: A gentleman is simply a patient wolf
en_quotes.author: Lana Turner

en_quotes.quote: Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Man becomes great exactly in the degree in which he works for the welfare of his fellow-men
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: As a rule, men worry more about what they can't see than about what they can
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Timid men prefer the calm of despotism to the tempestuous sea of liberty
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Video games are a waste of time for men with nothing else to do. Real brains don't do that
en_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

en_quotes.quote: Now hatred is by far the longest pleasure; men love in haste but they detest at leisure
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: A bachelor is a guy who never made the same mistake once
en_quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

en_quotes.quote: Why should I ask the wise men: Whence is my beginning? I am busy with the thought: Where will be my end?
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

en_quotes.quote: When a girl marries, she exchanges the attentions of many men for the inattention of one
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: All men who have turned out worth anything have had the chief hand in their own education
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: I know how men think when they're not responding to questions in a clinical study
en_quotes.author: Steve Harvey

en_quotes.quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Gold is good in its place; but loving, brave, patriotic men are better than gold
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Luck is not something you can mention in the presence of self-made men
en_quotes.author: E. B. White

en_quotes.quote: Passion is what gets you through the hardest times that might otherwise make strong men weak, or make you give up
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: All men should strive to learn before they die, what they are running from, and to, and why
en_quotes.author: James Thurber

en_quotes.quote: Men, their rights, and nothing more; women, their rights, and nothing less
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: The time is near at hand which must determine whether Americans are to be free men or slaves
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: When men speak ill of thee, live so as nobody may believe them
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: When men yield up the privilege of thinking, the last shadow of liberty quits the horizon
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: The rules of wildlife are simple and clear, which is not the case for men
en_quotes.author: Laurent Baheux

en_quotes.quote: Live as brave men; and if fortune is adverse, front its blows with brave hearts
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Many men owe the grandeur of their lives to their tremendous difficulties
en_quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with men possessing riches. The wrong comes when riches possess men
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: All men are liable to error; and most men are, in many points, by passion or interest, under temptation to it
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: One of the things being in politics has taught me is that men are not a reasoned or reasonable sex
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Women encourage men to be childish, then scold them
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Men can starve from a lack of self-realization as much as they can from a lack of bread
en_quotes.author: Richard Wright

en_quotes.quote: Men often act knowingly against their interest
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: Girls have an unfair advantage over men: if they can't get what they want by being smart, they can get it by being dumb
en_quotes.author: Yul Brynner

en_quotes.quote: Strong men have sound ideas and the force to make these ideas effective
en_quotes.author: Andrew Mellon

en_quotes.quote: Father's Day is hopefully a time when the culture says, 'This is our moment to look at who our men and boys are.'
en_quotes.author: Michael Gurian

en_quotes.quote: The mountains, the forest, and the sea, render men savage; they develop the fierce, but yet do not destroy the human
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: A jury is composed of twelve men of average ignorance
en_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Much smoking kills live men and cures dead swine
en_quotes.author: George Dennison Prentice

en_quotes.quote: Even the handsomest men do not have the same momentary effect on the world as a truly beautiful woman does
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Carroll

en_quotes.quote: If any civilization is to survive, it is the morality of altruism that men have to reject
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: Men shut their doors against a setting sun
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Let me embrace thee, sour adversity, for wise men say it is the wisest course
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Old men are dangerous: it doesn't matter to them what is going to happen to the world
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of men: the righteous who think they are sinners and the sinners who think they are righteous
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Deprived of meaningful work, men and women lose their reason for existence; they go stark, raving mad
en_quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

en_quotes.quote: A beard doesn't grow only on gurus; it grows on all men
en_quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

en_quotes.quote: Clever and attractive women do not want to vote; they are willing to let men govern as long as they govern men
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men and women are created equal
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

en_quotes.quote: Men are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Men use thought only as authority for their injustice, and employ speech only to conceal their thoughts
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Men are more moral than they think and far more immoral than they can imagine
en_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

en_quotes.quote: Labor disgraces no man; unfortunately, you occasionally find men who disgrace labor
en_quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

en_quotes.quote: Whoever has provoked men to rage against him has always gained a party in his favor, too
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Pride, envy, avarice - these are the sparks have set on fire the hearts of all men
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: Violence and arms can never resolve the problems of men
en_quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

en_quotes.quote: All the reasonings of men are not worth one sentiment of women
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: The practice of charity will bind us - will bind all men in one great brotherhood
en_quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

en_quotes.quote: And the blood of brave men was shed like unto the shedding of rain from a black cloud
en_quotes.author: Ferdowsi

en_quotes.quote: Satire lies about literary men while they live and eulogy lies about them when they die
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Old men are fond of giving good advice to console themselves for their inability to give bad examples
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: If help and salvation are to come, they can only come from the children, for the children are the makers of men
en_quotes.author: Maria Montessori

en_quotes.quote: When the sword is once drawn, the passions of men observe no bounds of moderation
en_quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: These are the times that try men's souls
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Men become wise just as they become rich, more by what they save than by what they receive
en_quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

en_quotes.quote: It is the privilege of the gods to want nothing, and of godlike men to want little
en_quotes.author: Diogenes

en_quotes.quote: Women love us for our defects. If we have enough of them, they will forgive us everything, even our gigantic intellects
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Most men pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that they hurry past it
en_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: Whatever deceives men seems to produce a magical enchantment
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Men are by nature merely indifferent to one another; but women are by nature enemies
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: There are no hopeless situations; there are only men who have grown hopeless about them
en_quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

en_quotes.quote: To the men in Washington, the world is just a giant Monopoly board
en_quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

en_quotes.quote: To send light into the darkness of men's hearts - such is the duty of the artist
en_quotes.author: Robert Schumann

en_quotes.quote: When small men attempt great enterprises, they always end by reducing them to the level of their mediocrity
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: A great city is that which has the greatest men and women
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Seriously, in America there are more big, curvy girls than there are little girls, and men love us, too
en_quotes.author: Jill Scott

en_quotes.quote: I only like two kinds of men, domestic and imported
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: Men who wish to know about the world must learn about it in its particular details
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: When two men in business always agree, one of them is unnecessary
en_quotes.author: Ezra Pound

en_quotes.quote: I only have 'yes' men around me. Who needs 'no' men?
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: There would be no great men if there were no little ones
en_quotes.author: George Herbert

en_quotes.quote: Time destroys the speculation of men, but it confirms nature
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: To sin by silence, when we should protest, Makes cowards out of men
en_quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

en_quotes.quote: Fatherhood is an honor, and men should be strong enough to step up to the plate
en_quotes.author: Karamo Brown

en_quotes.quote: Consistency is the paste jewel that only cheap men cherish
en_quotes.author: William Allen White

en_quotes.quote: In the past, men created witches: now they create mental patients
en_quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

en_quotes.quote: Envy blinds men and makes it impossible for them to think clearly
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: Many men have been capable of doing a wise thing, more a cunning thing, but very few a generous thing
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: Charm, in most men and nearly all women, is a decoration
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: Gladly we desire to make other men perfect, but we will not amend our own fault
en_quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

en_quotes.quote: To me all men are boy-men. I don't know any man that's actually mature
en_quotes.author: Seth Rogen

en_quotes.quote: Most men seem to live according to sense rather than reason
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: I was surrounded by strong women so it had never even occurred to me that women were anything other than equal to men
en_quotes.author: David Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Diamonds never leave you... men do!
en_quotes.author: Shirley Bassey

en_quotes.quote: Men should be like Kleenex, soft, strong and disposable
en_quotes.author: Cher

en_quotes.quote: On this shrunken globe, men can no longer live as strangers
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: By nature, men love newfangledness
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

en_quotes.quote: Men are like steel. When they lose their temper, they lose their worth
en_quotes.author: Chuck Norris

en_quotes.quote: Every man needs two women: a quiet home-maker, and a thrilling nymph
en_quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: Men mourn for what they have lost; women for what they ain't got
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Mediocre men work at their best; men seeking excellence strive to do better
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: Men are not the enemy, but the fellow victims. The real enemy is women's denigration of themselves
en_quotes.author: Betty Friedan

en_quotes.quote: Men aren't necessities. They're luxuries
en_quotes.author: Cher

en_quotes.quote: The less men think, the more they talk
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: It's at the borders of pain and suffering that the men are separated from the boys
en_quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

en_quotes.quote: Like all young men I set out to be a genius, but mercifully laughter intervened
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

en_quotes.quote: There are many men of principle in both parties in America, but there is no party of principle
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: Committee - a group of men who individually can do nothing but as a group decide that nothing can be done
en_quotes.author: Fred Allen

en_quotes.quote: Men marry because they are tired; women, because they are curious; both are disappointed
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Ignorance makes most men go into a political party, and shame keeps them from getting out of it
en_quotes.author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

en_quotes.quote: The powerful men in my life have always believed in me: my husband, my son
en_quotes.author: Judy Collins

en_quotes.quote: Nothing in the affairs of men is worthy of great anxiety
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: The advice of the elders to young men is very apt to be as unreal as a list of the hundred best books
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Men are born to succeed, not to fail
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Men think highly of those who rise rapidly in the world; whereas nothing rises quicker than dust, straw, and feathers
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Most men who have really lived have had, in some share, their great adventure. This railway is mine
en_quotes.author: James J. Hill

en_quotes.quote: Landlords, like all other men, love to reap where they never sowed
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: Men at most differ as Heaven and Earth, but women, worst and best, as Heaven and Hell
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: I never wanted to weigh more heavily on a man than a bird
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: Great deeds give choice of many tales. Choose a slight tale, enrich it large, and then let wise men listen
en_quotes.author: Pindar

en_quotes.quote: For evil to flourish, it only requires good men to do nothing
en_quotes.author: Simon Wiesenthal

en_quotes.quote: On Monday mornings I am dedicated to the proposition that all men are created jerks
en_quotes.author: H. Allen Smith

en_quotes.quote: An artist needn't be a clergyman or a churchwarden, but he certainly must have a warm heart for his fellow men
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: People who know little are usually great talkers, while men who know much say little
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: The world would be happier if men had the same capacity to be silent that they have to speak
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: Men are more easily governed through their vices than through their virtues
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Men should strive to think much and know little
en_quotes.author: Democritus

en_quotes.quote: All men are by nature born equally free and independent
en_quotes.author: George Mason

en_quotes.quote: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: Men take only their needs into consideration - never their abilities
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: It is always good men who do the most harm in the world
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: One man that has a mind and knows it can always beat ten men who haven't and don't
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: There is something good in men that really yearn for discipline
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: Rules are for the obedience of fools and the guidance of wise men
en_quotes.author: Harry Day

en_quotes.quote: Unions in wedlock are perverted by the victory of shameless passion that masters the female among men and beasts
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Men willingly believe what they wish
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Law grinds the poor, and rich men rule the law
en_quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

en_quotes.quote: Few men of action have been able to make a graceful exit at the appropriate time
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

en_quotes.quote: Shoes for men are about elegance or wealth; they are not playing with the inner character
en_quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

en_quotes.quote: Men don't care what's on TV. They only care what else is on TV
en_quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

en_quotes.quote: Men should never marry their muse. It ruins the illusion
en_quotes.author: Stana Katic

en_quotes.quote: Men would live exceedingly quiet if these two words, mine and thine, were taken away
en_quotes.author: Anaxagoras

en_quotes.quote: Young men think old men are fools; but old men know young men are fools
en_quotes.author: George Chapman

en_quotes.quote: The more I see of men, the more I like dogs
en_quotes.author: Clara Bow

en_quotes.quote: If boyhood and youth are but vanity, must it not be our ambition to become men?
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: It is wrong to assume that men of immense wealth are always happy
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: Men are only as good as their technical development allows them to be
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: It takes time to persuade men to do even what is for their own good
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: I don't think there are any men who are faithful to their wives
en_quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as justice in the abstract; it is merely a compact between men
en_quotes.author: Epicurus

en_quotes.quote: Some men have thousands of reasons why they cannot do what they want to, when all they need is one reason why they can
en_quotes.author: Martha Graham

en_quotes.quote: For many men, the acquisition of wealth does not end their troubles, it only changes them
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: If the world were a logical place, men would ride side saddle
en_quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

en_quotes.quote: Guys understand a waistline. They understand a silhouette. I dress for men
en_quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

en_quotes.quote: At Athens, wise men propose, and fools dispose
en_quotes.author: Alcuin

en_quotes.quote: No man has any natural authority over his fellow men
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: Men get to be a mixture of the charming mannerisms of the women they have known
en_quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: Honor is simply the morality of superior men
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: I think it's pathetic that women and men treat each other worse than we treat our pets. It's love or hate
en_quotes.author: Gene Simmons

en_quotes.quote: English culture is basically homosexual in the sense that the men only really care about other men
en_quotes.author: Germaine Greer

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is as peevish and pedantic as men's judgments of one another
en_quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

en_quotes.quote: There are 10 men in me and I do not know or understand one of them
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: The graveyards are full of indispensable men
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: It is not women's liberation, it is women's and men's liberation
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: Men must know their limitations
en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: I believe men and women should get equal pay for equal work
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: How is it that little children are so intelligent and men so stupid? It must be education that does it
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: There are two types of men: the great and the small
en_quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

en_quotes.quote: The greater intellect one has, the more originality one finds in men. Ordinary persons find no difference between men
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Women thrive on novelty and are easy meat for the commerce of fashion. Men prefer old pipes and torn jackets
en_quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

en_quotes.quote: Conservation means the wise use of the earth and its resources for the lasting good of men
en_quotes.author: Gifford Pinchot

en_quotes.quote: Can't you read? The score demands 'con amore', and what are you doing? You are playing it like married men!
en_quotes.author: Arturo Toscanini

en_quotes.quote: The first rule of business is: Do other men for they would do you
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: Do well what you do. And do it conscious that you ought to be leaders among men
en_quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

en_quotes.quote: When Harvard men say they have graduated from Radcliffe, then we've made it
en_quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: In consequence of inventing machines, men will be devoured by them
en_quotes.author: Jules Verne

en_quotes.quote: Those men are most apt to be obsequious and conciliating abroad, who are under the discipline of shrews at home
en_quotes.author: Washington Irving

en_quotes.quote: Hard men present hard choices - none more so than Vladimir Putin, the President of Russia
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: Circumstances rule men; men do not rule circumstances
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: Deliberation is the work of many men. Action, of one alone
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men
en_quotes.author: Martha Graham

en_quotes.quote: I see many more men who are feminist, or at least who have learned about life in the context of feminism
en_quotes.author: Jane Fonda

en_quotes.quote: God appoints our graces to be nurses to other men's weaknesses
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: If God were suddenly condemned to live the life which He has inflicted upon men, He would kill Himself
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: There should be awareness on menstrual hygiene among men as well
en_quotes.author: Arunachalam Muruganantham

en_quotes.quote: Men fail much oftener from want of perseverance than from want of talent
en_quotes.author: William Cobbett

en_quotes.quote: Such are the heights of wickedness to which men are driven by religion
en_quotes.author: Lucretius

en_quotes.quote: It is the loose ends with which men hang themselves
en_quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: If men knew how women pass the time when they are alone, they'd never marry
en_quotes.author: O. Henry

en_quotes.quote: Literature is an avenue to glory, ever open for those ingenious men who are deprived of honours or of wealth
en_quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

en_quotes.quote: On their own merits modest men are dumb
en_quotes.author: George Colman

en_quotes.quote: Injustice boils in men's hearts as does steel in its cauldron, ready to pour forth, white hot, in the fullness of time
en_quotes.author: Mary Harris Jones

en_quotes.quote: Men do not quit playing because they grow old; they grow old because they quit playing
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: I can paint pictures, but I cannot rule men
en_quotes.author: Fra Angelico

en_quotes.quote: Converse with men makes sharp the glittering wit, but God to man doth speak in solitude
en_quotes.author: John Stuart Blackie

en_quotes.quote: Certainly the best works, and of greatest merit for the public, have proceeded from the unmarried, or childless men
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: By indignities men come to dignities
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Passion makes idiots of the cleverest men, and makes the biggest idiots clever
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: When men and women agree, it is only in their conclusions; their reasons are always different
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: I've always liked men better than women
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: Women prefer to talk in twos, while men prefer to talk in threes
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: I am an agnostic; I do not pretend to know what many ignorant men are sure of
en_quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

en_quotes.quote: By all measures men are the more violent gender
en_quotes.author: Steven Pinker

en_quotes.quote: It seems only natural to me to present my men's and women's collections together
en_quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

en_quotes.quote: We soon found that the white men were growing rich very fast, and were greedy
en_quotes.author: Chief Joseph

en_quotes.quote: Where all men think alike, no one thinks very much
en_quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

en_quotes.quote: I usually make up my mind about a man in ten seconds, and I very rarely change it
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: For most men life is a search for the proper manila envelope in which to get themselves filed
en_quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

en_quotes.quote: Boys will be boys, and so will a lot of middle-aged men
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: I am happy that women can relate to my songs, and hopefully men can too
en_quotes.author: Martina McBride

en_quotes.quote: Finally, fighting for gay rights, speaking out in various places and making friends, men and women, was great
en_quotes.author: George Weinberg

en_quotes.quote: When a man is no longer anxious to do better than well, he is done for
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Haydon

en_quotes.quote: Men give away nothing so liberally as their advice
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: The public weal requires that men should betray, and lie, and massacre
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Men, who are rogues individually, are in the mass very honorable people
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: Those men get along best with women who can get along best without them
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them
en_quotes.author: Bill Maher

en_quotes.quote: Manhood coerced into sensitivity is no manhood at all
en_quotes.author: Camille Paglia

en_quotes.quote: A woman simply is, but a man must become
en_quotes.author: Camille Paglia

en_quotes.quote: Human misery is too great for men to do without faith
en_quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

en_quotes.quote: All men have an instinct for conflict: at least, all healthy men
en_quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

en_quotes.quote: Men tire themselves in pursuit of rest
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: Whatever makes men good Christians, makes them good citizens
en_quotes.author: Daniel Webster

en_quotes.quote: Most men, when they think they are thinking, are merely rearranging their prejudices
en_quotes.author: Knute Rockne

en_quotes.quote: All men were made by the Great Spirit Chief. They are all brothers
en_quotes.author: Chief Joseph

en_quotes.quote: Men tend to feel threatened; women tend to feel guilty
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: First find the man in yourself if you will inspire manliness in others
en_quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

en_quotes.quote: Men, as well as women, are much oftener led by their hearts than by their understandings
en_quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

en_quotes.quote: Culture makes all men gentle
en_quotes.author: Menander

en_quotes.quote: Every time a man expects, as he says, his money to work for him, he is expecting other people to work for him
en_quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

en_quotes.quote: In life we shall find many men that are great, and some that are good, but very few men that are both great and good
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: Men's arguments often prove nothing but their wishes
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: There is always a type of man who says he loves his fellow men, and expects to make a living at it
en_quotes.author: E. W. Howe

en_quotes.quote: Men have as exaggerated an idea of their rights as women have of their wrongs
en_quotes.author: E. W. Howe

en_quotes.quote: Men may live fools, but fools they cannot die
en_quotes.author: Edward Young

en_quotes.quote: Men are not punished for their sins, but by them
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: One must judge men not by their opinions, but by what their opinions have made of them
en_quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

en_quotes.quote: Men won't read any email from a woman that's over 200 words long
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: Whenever ideas fail, men invent words
en_quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

en_quotes.quote: He was one of those men who possess almost every gift, except the gift of the power to use them
en_quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

en_quotes.quote: Stronger by weakness, wiser men become
en_quotes.author: Edmund Waller

en_quotes.quote: Every man is a volume if you know how to read him
en_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

en_quotes.quote: The true index of a man's character is the health of his wife
en_quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

en_quotes.quote: Neutral men are the devil's allies
en_quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

en_quotes.quote: Men are not against you; they are merely for themselves
en_quotes.author: Gene Fowler

en_quotes.quote: Men, even when alone, lighten their labors by song, however rude it may be
en_quotes.author: Quintilian

en_quotes.quote: Men do not fail; they give up trying
en_quotes.author: Elihu Root

en_quotes.quote: Men are like sheep, of which a flock is more easily driven than a single one
en_quotes.author: Richard Whately

en_quotes.quote: Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts
en_quotes.author: Max Lerner

en_quotes.quote: Italian men do appreciate beautiful women. They're not afraid of the beauty, which is nice
en_quotes.author: Eva Herzigova

en_quotes.quote: Men are actually the weaker sex
en_quotes.author: George Weinberg

en_quotes.quote: Law describes the way things would work if men were angels
en_quotes.author: Christopher Dawson

en_quotes.quote: No nice men are good at getting taxis
en_quotes.author: Katharine Whitehorn

en_quotes.quote: Men are different. When they are in love they may also have other girlfriends
en_quotes.author: Zhang Ziyi

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of a strong, lasting commitment is often best understood by men incapable of it
en_quotes.author: Murray Kempton
